item.title: Exploring Process Mining in R
item.description: In this post, we’ll explore the BupaR suite of Process Mining packages created by Gert Janssenswillen from Hasselt University. We start with exploring the patients dataset contained in the eventdataR package. According to the documentation, this is an “Artifical eventlog about patients”. Getting started After installing all required packages, we can load the whole “bupaverse” by loading the bupaR package. library(ggplot2) library(bupaR) #library(eventdataR) df <- eventdataR::patients The data is already in event log format, let’s check it out.
